DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine change frequency complete spontaneous bowel movement ( CSBMs ) 4 week oral supplementation Lactobacillus gasseri DSM 27123 healthy adult woman functional constipation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lactobacillus Gasseri DSM 27123 Functional Constipation Healthy Women
DOC.criteria: The subject meet follow criterion eligible enter study : 1 . Willing able provide inform consent 2 . Women age 1849 year Visit 1 3 . BMI ≥18 ≤29 Visit 1 4 . Suffering functional constipation define Rome III criterion functional constipation 5 . Comply requirement use probiotic product Visit 1 throughout study period 6 . Not pregnant breastfeed 7 . Using adequate contraceptive measure 8 . Ability understand comply requirement study , judge Investigator 1 . Hypersensitivity allergy investigational product , chemically related product comparator/placebo 2 . Wellknown , organic cause constipation 3 . Anorectal pathology 4 . Previous gastrointestinal surgery 5 . Any alarm symptom ( i.e . rectal bleeding , weight loss , jaundice ) judge Investigator 6 . Spinal anomaly injuries 7 . Use antibiotic within 4 week prior Visit 1 8 . Use product contain probiotic week previous 3 week 9 . Mental behavioural disorder judge Investigator 10 . Food allergy
